channel.title: CVE Feed for Qlik Sense -- Qlik Sense Enterprise on Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qlik Sense -- Qlik Sense Enterprise on Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-0564|2024-08-06T12:32:37.966Z -- qlik%20sense -- qlik%20sense%20enterprise%20on%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability in Qlik Sense Enterprise on Windows could allow an remote attacker to enumerate domain user accounts. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending authentication requests to an affected system. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to compare the response time that are returned by the affected system to determine which accounts are valid user accounts. Affected systems are only vulnerable if they have LDAP configured.
